string.text: Capture the plant
Capture the plant used to extract anomalous substances from the bottom of the Swamps.
Capture the guard tower
Help the Clear Sky squad take over the guard tower held by bandits.
Repel the bandit attack on the tower
Repel the bandit counterattack on the guard tower.
Capture the Machine Yard
Capture the Machine Yard to the northeast of the Swamps by taking out the renegades there.
Capture the path to the outside world
Secure the path to the Cordon by capturing the adjacent position.
Reinforce Clear Sky’s presence at the Swamps
Reinforce Clear Sky’s presence at the Swamps by eliminating enemy forces.
Go to the Cordon with the guide
Meet the guide and go to the Cordon with him.
Go to the Great Swamps with the guide
Ask the guide to take you to the Great Swamps.
Take over the Swamps
Take over the Swamps to make the roads safe for guides.
Talk to the barman
Ask the barman about the Clear Sky base.
Talk to Lebedev
Find out what Lebedev wanted.
Ask Lebedev about what happened
Ask Lebedev about what happened after the second emission.
Reach an agreement with Lebedev
Reach an agreement with Lebedev to help you leave the Swamps.
Head to the outpost with the guide
Ask the guide to take you to the outpost.
Talk to Sidorovich
Ask Sidorovich about the stalker who was interested in strange components. It’s the only clue Clear Sky has about why the Zone is being shaken by emissions.
Take the equipment from the trader
Get the set of equipment from the trader.
Help Clear Sky at the outpost
Respond to the help signal from the Clear Sky outpost.
Kill the boars
Eliminate the boars attacking the Clear Sky outpost.
Return to the Clear Sky base
Reach cover inside the Clear Sky base before the emission hits.
Ascend the tower
Ascend the tower to escape the monsters.
Deliver grenades
The Clear Sky squad has requested a few grenades.
Deliver medical supplies
The Clear Sky squad is in dire need of medical supplies.
Deliver ammo
The Clear Sky squad needs shotgun shells.
Deliver ammo
The Clear Sky squad needs pistol ammo.
Deliver ammo
The Clear Sky squad needs assault rifle ammo.
Return the PM

While out on a night mission a Clear Sky squad ran into a boar lair. It’s probably too late to save the men, but the squad commander had a modified Makarov PM. The pistol will be useful to the faction. Return it.
Return the AKS-74U

A few days ago renegades attacked a Clear Sky squad, just as they were buying a shipment of weapons from the military. Most shooters were captured by the renegades, but the best assault rifle was hidden. You need to recover it.
Get the artifact

A Clear Sky squad received a help signal from a stalker who said that he found a rare artifact, but didn’t know how to get out of an anomalous area. The squad couldn’t get to him in time and the signal died. You need to get the artifact.
Return the PDA
One of our best pathfinders has gone missing while out on a night recon mission. You need to return the scout’s PDA to make sure the information he collected does not go to waste.
Return the suit

Renegades recently captured the small plant at the Swamps, just as an experiment was being conducted there. A suit was being saturated with anomalous jelly. Return the suit so that our scientists can assess the experiment.
Help
Find information about kevlar body armor
To improve armor, Gray needs information about kevlar body armor.
Find information about muzzle breaks
Gray wants to fix up a special muzzle break, but doesn’t know enough about how they work. Find the related information and bring it to him.
Find information about barrel modification
Gray can make a barrel attachment which would improve a weapon’s characteristics, but he’s missing some data.
Mercernary, stay focused! Our goal is to take control over the Swamps. If you don’t know what to do, look in your PDA for active tasks.
PDA with information about the Swamps, collected by a pathfinder from Clear Sky.
CS scout’s PDA
